content: I don't have real-time information about the current state of the cafes. however, both cafes are popular spots among locals and tourists alike, so there is a possibility they can get crowded during peak hours. it's best to plan ahead and make a reservation to secure a seat or visit during non-peak hours to avoid the crowds. keep in mind that cafes in taipei tend to be busiest on weekends, so if you're looking to avoid crowds, it's best to visit during the weekdays.
